snippet: Mary Lambert found fame with the hip-hop duo Macklemore & Ryan Lewis on the gay rights anthem “Same Love,” but she is reclaiming that song’s message in her own tender music and poetry.
abstract: Jon Caramanica notes that singer-songwriter Mary Lambert is using national exposure she gained from her contribution to Macklemore & Ryan Lewis hit single Same Love to promote her solo work.
lead_paragraph: Mary Lambert found fame with the hip-hop duo Macklemore & Ryan Lewis on the gay rights anthem “Same Love,” but she is reclaiming that song’s message in her own tender music and poetry.

headline.print_headline: A Singer Whose Context Is ‘Love and Heart’
headline.seo: Mary Lambert Breaks Out on Her Own
headline.main: A Singer Whose Context Is ‘Love and Heart’
